Token.Abstract: Defines selectors that a delegate of SPBrandEngageClient can implement for being notified of offers availability and engagement status.
Sent when BrandEngage receives an answer about offers availability.

Parameter.Name: brandEngageClient
Parameter.Abstract: The instance of SPBrandEngageClient that sent this message.

Parameter.Name: areOffersAvailable
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean value indicating whether offers are available. If this value is YES, you can start the engagement.

Token.Abstract: Sent when a running engagement changes state.

Parameter.Name: brandEngageClient
Parameter.Abstract: The instance of SPBrandEngageClient that sent this message.

Parameter.Name: newStatus
Parameter.Abstract: A constant value of the SPBrandEngageClientStatus type indicating the new status of the engagement.
